segments.text: Both Bob and carl will become somebody in the future.Don ' t you think so ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah.But Bob's talent can't to be named on the same day with Carl's .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But Bob is more generous and ready to help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We cannot judge a man totally by that .
segments.speaker: S2
